creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: seated man with his arms crossed, wearing garments that are tan, plaid, and floral, in brown, tan, and blue, with two swords at his waist; small bag in grey and white pattern with flowers in LRQ; falling leaves, with mountain landscape with fall trees in ULQ; long curled-over piece of paper with text at bottom center; received framed
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Ogura Imitations of One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets
title: Poem by Chûnagon Asatada: Endô Musha Moritô
